citations.narrative:
The facility is lacking an adequate perimeter fence around the kangaroos. Fifty-two kangaroos are enclosed by a 6ft
fence. The enclosure is set back away from the road but there is no additional fencing between the kangaroo enclosure
and the road or along the driveway. A perimeter fence serves as a secondary containment should an animal escape and
as a means to protect the animals from unauthorized persons and animal pests and predators. Correct by ensuring that
enclosures housing regulated species are surrounded by a perimeter fence, at least 6ft tall and at least 3ft away from the
enclosures, that prevents unauthorized people and animals from going under or through the fence. Correct by 12/12/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Moira Roberts, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The facility is lacking an adequate perimeter fence around the kangaroos. Fifty-two kangaroos are enclosed by a 6ft 
fence. The enclosure is set back away from the road but there is no additional fencing between the kangaroo enclosure 
and the road or along the driveway. A perimeter fence serves as a secondary containment should an animal escape and 
as a means to protect the animals from unauthorized persons and animal pests and predators. Correct by ensuring that 
enclosures housing regulated species are surrounded by a perimeter fence, at least 6ft tall and at least 3ft away from the 
enclosures, that prevents unauthorized people and animals from going under or through the fence. Correct by 12/12/25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Moira Roberts, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
